prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Korálky Katlas has prepared a summary of things to watch out for when buying costume jewelry and jewelry-making supplies, in response to increasing customer reports of issues.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Korálky Katlas, costume jewelry, jewelry-making supplies, customer reports, issues, summary, buying
